rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh? Sorry, me not see friends there.
But now me see you, me sense friends
have some wonderful stories to share!

rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If friends be so kind, would
please to share some exciting
tales of adventure?

rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If do share, I happy to share
something in return - very special
dessert from secret stash!

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0101
rows.name: Tell tales for a Love Doughnut?

rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0102
rows.name:
I use as inspiration when
creating new songs to make
listeners all tingly!

rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0103
rows.name:
As promised, is reward for
friends. Is very special dessert!

rows.label: tlk70000159_01_msg0202
rows.name:
If friends change mind, I
always happy to listen at
later date or whatever!
